summary: This is an email dated October 15, 2019, from an unspecified sender to a recipient identified as 'M', requesting assistance in securing an interview room in West Palm Beach (WPB) for meetings with Epstein victims. The sender indicates they are currently in Miami for an Epstein victim meeting and have victims who wish to meet the following day.

events.title: Epstein Victim Meeting in Miami
events.description: A meeting involving victims of Jeffrey Epstein was held in Miami, as referenced by the email sender who states they are 'presently in Miami for the Epstein victim meeting'.

events.title: Planned Victim Meetings in West Palm Beach
events.description: The email requests an interview room for the following day to meet with victims in West Palm Beach (WPB).

keyFacts: An email from October 15, 2019, shows logistical planning for meetings with Epstein victims, indicating ongoing victim engagement efforts after Epstein's death in August 2019.
The correspondence suggests a need for secure interview spaces, possibly for legal or investigative purposes related to the Epstein case.
The email highlights activity in two Florida locations: Miami and West Palm Beach, both areas significant to Epstein's operations.
